title: Extracting lung cancer staging descriptors from pathology reports: A generative language model approach
details: H Cho, S Yoo, B Kim, S Jang, L Sunwoo, S Kim, D Lee… - Journal of Biomedical …, 2024
abstract: Background In oncology, electronic health records contain textual key information for the diagnosis, staging, and treatment planning of patients with cancer. However, text data processing requires a lot of time and effort, which limits the utilization of these …
